about_the_game:
A Cozy Fun Card-Battler!


Mildred's proving to her daughter that she’s not ready for the Old Folks Home. Join her in different adventures as she battles her way to independence with the help of her trusty Tarot Deck!

Can Mildred defeat the estranged friend who owes her money? Will she be able to get her grandson’s red-hot Christmas toy? Can she foil the vacuum cleaner salesperson?! Use the cards to help Mildred triumph!

  • 22 Card Major Arcana Base Deck Designed by Mildred Herself!
  • Easy to Learn, Turn-Based Gameplay with Time to Strategize!
  • Pick Which Cute New Cards You Build Your Deck With!
  • Face Off in 12 Different Battles and an Ultimate Boss Showdown!
  • Numerous Hilarious Special Attacks in Your Deck!
  • Quirky Cut Scenes Lead into Every Battle!
  • Face Unique Enemies with Their Own Zany Special Attacks!
  • A Wacky and Fun Adventure With Granny Mildred!

What about that eccentric guy from the Church of Perpetual Motion? Or the Doctor who pushes Mildred around instead of giving her the help she needs? These and other enemies are making Mildred’s daughter Lydia think she can't hack it on her own.

Will Mildred stand for it? Heck no! She designed her own super-cute Tarot Deck to help her overcome every obstacle!

Play the demo for a taste of the funny and addictive gameplay!
